articles.title: Mona Lisa v ‘the monstrous’: the grotesque, shocking side of Leonardo da Vinci - The Guardian
articles.description: The Italian master didn’t just paint the conventionally beautiful. As a new National Gallery show reveals, he was also drawn to irregular, diseased and aged faces – all captured with mind-bending accuracy and compassion
articles.content: Leonardo da Vinci comments in his notebooks that while few are trained in judging portraits, everyone feels entitled to criticise actual people: whether someone is a hunchback (gobbo), or has one sho… [+8413 chars]
